title: Design to Kidnap
description: Charlotte Green has a big mouth. It gets her into some big blunders, though is also helps some of her oldest dreams come true.When Charlotte. an interior designer, is given a project in the new housing project on the outsikirts of town, she doesn't expect that it would be the beginning of helping one of her oldest friends in an FBI case involving a kidnapped woman and a terrorist plot. Fortunately, he's always been there to look out for her - to love her.
author: Megan Swanson
